page.title: 16An Ordinary Day (Cont.)
page.content:
youngest member is 14 and our oldest is 50 and still teaching us a thing or two!
I usually have lunch with a girlfriend, usually just a snack and a chat over coffee. The children eat at school and I cook for all the family in the evening.
After lunch I drive down to the local shops if there is anything I need for today's meal, but the bulk of my shopping is done in the supermarkets in one of the nearby towns. Prices there are very competitive and the range of commodities available is much wider. I spend one whole day a week shopping. After the supermarkets I spend my time looking around the numerous other shops for clothing and other items for the family.
